author: zigford
body:
# Steps to reproduce

```|bash
pwsh-preview
```

# Expected behavior

Powershell preview launches

# Actual behavior

```none
Error:
  An assembly specified in the application dependencies manifest (pwsh.deps.json) was not found: 
    package: 'runtimepack.Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.linux-arm64', version: '3.0.0-preview8-28405-07'
    path: 'SOS_README.md'
```

# Environment data

Using `powershell-7.0.0-preview.3-linux-arm64.tar.gz` on Gentoo linux. 
Previous preview2 and Powershell 6.2.2 releases work fine.

comments.author: zigford
comments.body: Found out that the pwsh-preview will not launch is SOS_README.md and/or createdump is missing. Updated the ebuild to include them.

title: Cannot launch pwsh-preview 7 release 3 on arm64
